title: Expose issue_prioritization score breakdown in Issue Theme API + UI

sections.text: Priority scores are being computed but the MVP requires an explainable breakdown to make the ranking defensible. Add API fields on the issue theme response to return total score + per-factor contributions (frequency, severity, ARR tier) and the active scoring config version used. Update the Issue Theme detail and list views to display the breakdown consistently, including clear labels for fallbacks (e.g., unknown ARR tier/default severity) so users can understand why an issue is ranked where it is.
